page.title: 13Recreation
page.content: Crofton Community Association The Community Centre serves a catchment area of approx. 5sq. miles including Stubbington and Hill Head.The community Centre buildings originally housed a boys' boarding school until the early 1960's. In 1983 H.C.C. agreed aid for employment of a full time warden. There are on average 51 regular group bookings per week. There is an open-air,unheated swimming pool available to members and run by volunteers.It is open fron May to September. There is a bowling green used by Crofton Bowls Club open from April - October. Stubbington Tennis Club own two tarmac tennis courts adjacent to the Centre. Stubbington Library is across the car park and is open daily.
